statements.select:
select a.CheckInTime,a.Status,a.OperatedBy,a.OperatedOn,a.DataSource,a.PackageId,a.AssessLevel,a.AssessLevelName,a.PackageBeginDate,a.PackageEndDate ,b.PackageName,b.PackageComment,b.PackageCharges,b.Remark,b.PackageType,b.PeriodType from Oca_EPay_AssessPackage a,Oca_EPay_Package b where a.PackageId=b.PackageId and a.Status=1 and b.Status=1 and b.PackageType='00002'and CONVERT(varchar(6), GETDATE(), 112) between a.PackageBeginDate and a.PackageEndDate
$OrderByClause$
